body_html:
Dear All,
I managed to solve it at the cost that I have to set every thread reads only one test example. I think the queues and threading mechanism of TensorFlow should re-design: the threading should be able to read the rest of queues automatically.

Thank you very much. And I would also appreciated if better solution to be given

body:
Dear All,
I managed to solve it at the cost that I have to set every thread reads only one test example. I think the queues and threading mechanism of TensorFlow should re-design: the threading should be able to read the rest of queues automatically.

Thank you very much. And I would also appreciated if better solution to be given
